task.title: How to Subtract Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the subtraction feature of the caluclator application

prereq.p: To sucessfully subtract numbers, you must know what is subtraction.

result.p: The result of subtraction is displayed.

example.p: You want to subtract 3 from 5. The equation formed will be 5 - 3 . First enter number 5. Press the minus sign. Enter number 3 . Press Equals to.
The result is displayed on the screen
